Text:
Thanks! I was hoping you would share a PDF version, next to the DJVU you shared earlier.

Now I can read it during my morning commute! :-)
Excellent - thank you. I am including this in a torrent I am creating on fractal documentary. Wanted to make sure you got credit.
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7092257/Benoit_Mandelbrot__The_Fractal_Geometry_of_Nature same file with text recognized and better compression in case anyone needs it.
